control.datasource: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(a.id) =0 THEN '' WHEN COUNT(a.id) >0 THEN 'red' END as 'color', COUNT(a.id) as 'cantidad' FROM PAPERLESS_ASIGNACION A WHERE (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA)<=15 OR DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA) IS NULL) AND IdEstado NOT IN (8) AND (AperturaNavieras ='' or AperturaNavieras is null)

detail.datasourse: SELECT I.NumConsolidado, FechaMaster, C.Descripcion as 'Agente', D.Descripcion as 'Naviera', E.Descripcion as 'Nave', A.NumHousesBL as 'Cant. Houses/BLs', Viaje, convert(varchar(20),getdate(),113) as 'Actual', convert(varchar(20),FechaEta,113) as 'ETA', DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA) as 'Dif', convert(varchar(20),AperturaNavieras,113) as 'Apertura', g.NombreUsuario as 'usuario1', F.Descripcion as 'Estado' FROM PAPERLESS_ASIGNACION A LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_AGENTE C ON A.IdAgente=C.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVIERA D ON A.IdNaviera = D.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVE E ON A.IdNave = E.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_ESTADO F ON A.IdEstado = F.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS G ON A.Usuario1 = G.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS H ON A.Usuario2 = H.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_USUARIO1_HOUSESBL_INFO I ON A.Id = I.IdAsignacion WHERE (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA)<=15 OR DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA) IS NULL) AND IdEstado NOT IN (8) AND (AperturaNavieras ='' or AperturaNavieras is null) ORDER BY DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),FechaETA) DESC
